q: Michael Vick Isn't Hosting Super Bowl Party Associated Press- Eagles quarterback Michael Vick has told NFL commissioner Roger Goodell that he's not hosting a Super Bowl party this weekend. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. The commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans.
